about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are a passionate team dedicated to capturing the most important moments of your life with excellence, warmth and agility.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.description: We believe that every event is unique and deserves to be documented with maximum dedication. Our approach is not just to capture images, but to tell stories that endure over time. We combine professional technique with artistic sensitivity to create memories that move and transcend generations.

items.title: Quality
items.description: Because every person who chooses us deserves the best, from the first click to the final delivery.

items.title: Sensitivity
items.description: Because in every event there are real stories, people who feel, live and trust that we know how to capture that irreplaceable moment.

items.title: Speed
items.description: Because we understand that time matters and stories don't wait. We respond with agility and with the responsibility of being there when we are needed.

planning.title: Planning
planning.description: We study every detail of the event to anticipate key moments.

coverage.title: Comprehensive Coverage
coverage.description: Our team is strategically distributed to not miss any moment.

capture.title: Professional Capture
capture.description: We use advanced techniques and state-of-the-art equipment.

postproduction.title: Post-Production
postproduction.description: We carefully edit every image and video to achieve exceptional results.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: We love what we do and it shows in every image we capture.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: Our collaborative model allows us to cover every important moment.

quality.title: Technical Quality
quality.description: We use professional equipment and advanced techniques for exceptional results.

agility.title: Agility
agility.description: We adapt quickly to any situation to never miss a moment.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for perfection in every project, exceeding expectations.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: We build lasting relationships based on transparency and professionalism.

faqs.question: What types of events do we cover?
faqs.answer: Birthdays, weddings, corporate events, product launches, cultural events, concerts. If your event falls outside of these categories, you can tell us about it: we love new challenges.

faqs.question: How much advance notice should I contact them?
faqs.answer: The minimum time is one week. This way, we ensure that we understand the characteristics of your event well and can guarantee you the best result. If you are in an emergency and do not have a week, let us know, and we are willing to help.

faqs.question: How is the delivery of the material carried out?
faqs.answer: Digital formats, albums, USB, online gallery… we adapt to your preferences.

faqs.question: How long does it take to deliver the final material?
faqs.answer: Speed is our hallmark. We can deliver the material within one to two weeks.

faqs.question: How many photographers or videographers are assigned per event?
faqs.answer: As many as necessary; a large wedding is not the same as an intimate poetry reading. That’s why we emphasize understanding the specific characteristics of your event.

faqs.question: Can I request specific photos or videos during an event?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. The client has the option, both in the preparation of the event and during it, to request prioritizing certain elements or people over others.

faqs.question: How is privacy and the use of images handled?
faqs.answer: The images and videos are the property of the client, and we do not retain any rights over them. Exceptionally, we may request your permission to use the material for broadcasting purposes, but we depend on your approval.

faqs.question: How does the payment system work?
faqs.answer: Once the budget is confirmed, we request a payment of 30% of the total as a guarantee. The remaining 70% is made after the delivery of the material.

faqs.question: What happens if the event is canceled or postponed?
faqs.answer: If the event is canceled, we issue a refund of 30% of the amount paid. In case the event is postponed, we adapt to the new date regardless of what it is.

faqs.question: What payment methods do we accept?
faqs.answer: We accept payments by bank transfer, debit, or credit.

faqs.question: What can be offered in addition to coverage?
faqs.answer: In addition to the coverage of your event, we also conduct studio sessions before or after the event, location portraits, and interviews.

faqs.question: Can I choose the style or tone of the recording?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Part of the work we do during the preparation is to understand your aesthetic intentions so we can adapt to them and assign the team that can best bring them to life.

faqs.question: Do you offer coverage service for surprise events?
faqs.answer: Yes, we love it. In that case, we work closely with the organizer to understand the nature of the surprise, analyze the space to place hidden cameras, and blend in with the guests to capture the genuine and spontaneous moments that occur.

crewMembers.name: Batman
crewMembers.bio: Bruce Wayne, known as Batman, is a superhero from DC Comics who fights crime in Gotham City. Orphaned after the murder of his parents, he dedicates his life to combating crime using his physical and mental skills, as well as a vast fortune. Batman does not have superpowers, but he stands out for his intelligence, detective skills, martial arts, and a wide range of combat technology.
